title: Semyon Pomogayev
text:
Semyon Vyacheslavovich Pomogayev (; born 1 November 1993) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He plays as a <a href="central%20midfielder">central midfielder</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> for <a href="FC%20Tyumen">FC Tyumen</a> on 16 September 2012 in a game against <a href="FC%20Lada-Togliatti%20Togliatti">FC Lada-Togliatti Togliatti</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Ural%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural Yekaterinburg</a> on 1 April 2013 in a game against <a href="FC%20Tom%20Tomsk">FC Tom Tomsk</a>.
